name: Fly Noon
description:
Have you always wanted to experience flying cowboys and floating islands? Then this is for you! Help Wyatt reach his hot and deathly lover.

Submission for weeklygamejam 110

Theme: Floating Islands

Created by:

Art - https://fridge.itch.io/

Audio - samdt

Programming - Darexi

Special thanks to Miachel Feldman  for helping out with technical issues.

Some UI assets were from:

https://opengameart.org/content/free-keyboard-and-controllers-prompts-pack

https://loudeyes.itch.io/paper-ui-pack-for-games
